Package etomica.data.meter

Class MeterStructureFactor

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.data.meter.MeterStructureFactor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSourceIndependent, IDataSource

    public class MeterStructureFactor
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDataSource, DataSourceIndependent
    Meter for calculation of structure factor of atoms for all wave vectors less than a cutoff.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MeterStructureFactor

        public MeterStructureFactor​(Space space,
                            Box aBox,
                            double cutoff)
        Creates meter with default to compute the structure factor for all atoms in the box. All wave vectors consistent with the box shape and with magnitude less than cutoff are included.

    • Method Detail

      • resetData

        protected void resetData​()

      • makeWaveVector

        protected int makeWaveVector​(double cutoff)

      • setCutoff

        public void setCutoff​(double cutoff)
        Sets the wave vector cutoff. All wave vectors consistent with the box shape that have a magnitude less than the cutoff will be computed.
        Parameters:
        cutoff - the cutoff for the wave vector magnitude

      • setWaveVec

        public void setWaveVec​(Vector[] waveVec)
        Parameters:
        waveVec - Sets a custom wave vector array.

      • setAtoms

        public void setAtoms​(IAtomList atomList)
        Parameters:
        atomList - Sets the list of atoms for factor calculation.
